text: Stefka Petrova (), (b. 1950) is a prominent Bulgarian nutritionist and the director of the National Center of Public Health Protection (NCPHP), Sofia, Bulgaria. She is also the national consultant on nutrition at the Bulgarian Ministry of Health. She holds a Doctor of Medicine degree and PhD from Sofia Medical University. She is married to the Bulgarian neurologist, Ivan Atanassov Petrov and has one son. ==External links== * National Center of Public Health Protection Category:Bulgarian public health doctors Category:Nutritionists Category:Bulgarian health officials Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Women nutritionists
title: Stefka Petrova
